mapper.select: SELECT userno, userid, name, NICKNAME, gender, email,LPAD(POSTCODE,5,'0'), ADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, EXTRAADDRESS, phone, GRADENO, BLACK FROM usertb WHERE userno = #{userno}

SELECT userno,userid,name,NICKNAME,GENDER,gradeno,black FROM usertb
and gradeno < 5000
order by userno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usertb(userno, name, userid, userpw, email, gender, postcode, address, detailAddress, extraAddress, phone, nickname) VALUES (USER_SEQ.nextval, #{name}, #{userid}, CRYPTO.ENCRYPT_AES(#{userpw}), #{email}, #{gender}, LPAD(#{postcode},5,'0'), #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, #{phone}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: UPDATE usertb SET name = #{name}, email =#{email}, gender=#{gender}, postcode=#{postcode}, address =#{address}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress}, extraAddress = #{extraAddress}, phone = #{phone}, nickname = #{nickname} WHERE userno = #{userno }
